OrgIndustry.IndustryDescription: HDFC Bank Credit Card Section, India

PositionHistory.Description:
The objective of the call centre offline package is: Workflow automation: Automating the existing workflow for the call centre and the Back Office functions Facilitate the generation of the customer services MIS, the input for which would be reports from the call centre ACD, Correspondence and Vision PLUS
* Development of front end with JSP and XML, APIs and Data Access Objects. ; * Design Review of the APIs and resolving the design issues. ; * Code reviews for JSP and APIs Environment: Unix, Java, Servlets, Jsp, Struts, Javascript Apache Tomcat Server, MS SQL Server

PositionHistory.Title: Web Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Web Developer, SakSoft Chennai The system allows credit card holders to order merchandize through mail orders, and make Insurance premium payments using their credit cards. The system will be capable of processing order request, send order to merchant, follow-up on orders, bill customer and pay merchant. Purchases / Bonus redemption made by the credit card holder by using the proposed mail order system will be in the scope of this requirement. The mail order system would include Order management, Bonus points redemption through FAX / Mail, payments to insurance, reporting order status, creation of the merchants and merchandize in the system. The overall goals of the processing system would be: processing mail order request, Upload Delivery order to merchant, Tracking Order status, Billing credit card account for purchased merchandize and Settlement / Invoice Merchant.
* Developed front end with JSP,Controller Servlets and Data Access Objects ; * Code reviews for JSP and APIs Environment: Unix, Java, Servlets, Jsp, Struts, Javascript Weblogic App Server, Oracle 8

PositionHistory.Title: Software Developer
System Admin
Instructor
Software Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Software Developer, Dialognet Technologies, Chennai As a member of the elife club, every member will get discounts from the registered business establishments. Member will be able to do transaction through the portal. On every purchase through the portal member will be rewarded with the points. Which can be accumulated and redeemed .The system is developed as a 3-tier architecture in which, postgreSQL is used as the backend server, the business logic is implemented using Java Beans and JSP as the front end running on Tomcat web server
* Development of the JSPs and APIs * Involved in System and Integration testing ; * Involved in installing and configuring the application in Tomcat for development Environment: Solaris,Java, Servlets, Jsp,Javascript and PostgresSQL 7.0.3, Weblogic

PositionHistory.Title: Software Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Software Developer, Dialognet Technologies, Chennai This portal was developed for the Singapore national university to develop a research community. SingAREN, Singapore Advanced Research and Educational Network is a company incorporated in Singapore which comes under KRDL (Kent Ridge Digital Labs) and is responsible for taking care of the Network related research works of the Singapore University. The system is developed as an intranet portal, which is to be used inside the university campus. The system helps the student community to interact in a better way; get help from other experts in the subject thus help them do the research in a better way.
* Development of the JSPs and APIs * Involved in System and Intergration testing ; * Involved in installing and configuring the application in Tomcat for development Environment: Java, Servlets, Jsp, Javascript , EJB, Oracle, Weblogic

PositionHistory.Title: Software Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Software Developer , Dialognet Technologies, Chennai An application, which simulates the MRP (Material Requirements Planning) of Telace India Ltd. It consists of different modules i.e., the Inventory Module, which takes care of the inventory management and the inventory information, Planning Module takes care of the forecasting, Purchase Module, which registers the purchase transactions. Apart from this the software maintains the master records of Stores, Vendors etc and generates stock reports.
* Development of the JSPs and APIs * Involved in System and Integration testing ; * Involved in installing and configuring the application in Tomcat Environment: Windows NT,Java, Servlets, Jsp, Javascript and Oracle, Tomcat

PositionHistory.Title: Software Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
This system is developed for a Textile Industry, which wants to get direct Business and to know the details about their distributors. They have a showcase to upload their product models and their advertisement on the site. Their product can be ordered online and payment is only by cash or demand draft
* Development of the JSPs and APIs * Involved in System and Intergration testing ; * Involved in installing and configuring the application in Tomcat Environment: Windows Nt,Java, Servlets, Jsp,Javascript and Oracle, Tomcat, Windows NT 4.0

Competency.name: Development of the JSPs and APIs
Responsible for enhancement of FRA and CSD applications
Development of the front end and business rule components
Bachelors Degree > Bachelor of Technology > Bachelor of Technology Chemical Engineering

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 14 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Senior Applications Developer at HSBC. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Java Server Pages, Spring Framework, Java, Struts Web Application Framework, Java Servlets, UNIX, JavaScript, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, IBM WebSphere, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Oracle, DB2, Oracle 10g Application Server, JUnit, Enterprise Java Beans, JavaServer Faces, Hibernate, Apache Maven, Sun Solaris, Oracle 10G, Microsoft SQL Server, MVC, Control-M, Apache Subversion, Spring Batch, REST, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JDBC, Data Access Object, XML, WebLogic Portal, Web Services, SQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle Financials, Oracle 11g, Linux, Jboss, Jazz, Java Messaging Service, ECLiPSe, Apache Axis, AJAX, shell scripting, jQuery, iBATIS, Vision Plus, Sybase, SAX, RDBMS, PROMPT methodology, Oracle Treasury, Oracle Applications, Oracle 9i, Oracle 8, ORACLE MRP, LDAP, JBoss Java EE application server, IBM WebSphere Application Server, HTML, Ehcache, Document Object Model, Correspondence, CVS, APIs. This candidate has an extensive management experience (3 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2008-09 for 36 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Senior Applications Developer/Tech Lead at JPMorganChase.
